00021 define('CONTENT_FOR_LAYOUT', 'content_for_layout');
00022 
00027 abstract class SAPage extends Smarty implements SAIPage {
00028         protected $app;
00029         protected $name;
00030         protected $layout = 'default.php';
00031         protected $layoutDir;
00032         protected $regions = array();
00033         protected $content_type = 'text/html; charset=utf-8';
00034         protected $headers = array();
00035         protected $attributes = array();
00036         
00041         function __construct(SApplication &$app, $name) {
00042                 SALog::log("in page $name constructor", SA_LOG_NOTICE);         
00043                 parent::Smarty();
00044                 $this->app = &$app;
00045                 $this->assign_by_ref('app', $app);
00046                 $this->name = $name;            
00047                 $this->template = "{$name}.tpl";
00048                 $appHome = $app->getHomeDirectory();
00049                 $this->plugins_dir = array('plugins', SA_CORE_DIR . 'sa_smarty_plugins');
00050                 $this->layoutDir =  "{$appHome}/Layouts";
00051                 $this->template_dir = "{$appHome}/Templates";
00052                 $this->compile_dir = "{$appHome}/Templates_c";
00053                 $this->use_sub_dirs = true;
00054                 $this->headers = array(
00055                                                         'Expires' => 'Mon, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT',
00056                                                         'Last-Modified' => gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s') . ' GMT',
00057                                                         'Cache-Control' => 'no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate',
00058                                                         'Pragma' => 'no-cache'                                                          
00059                                                         );
00060         }
00061

00063                 
00064         }
00065         
00071         function __set($key, $value) {
00072                 $this->attributes[$key] = $value;
00073                 $this->assign($key, $value);
00074         }
00075         
00080         function __get($key) {
00081                 return $this->attributes[$key];
00082         }

00126         public function sendHeaders() {
00127                 if (!headers_sent()) {
00128                         $this->headers['Content-type'] = $this->content_type;
00129                         foreach($this->headers as $key => $value) {
00130                                 header("$key: $value");
00131                         }
00132                 }
00133         }
00134

00141                 $this->app = &$app;
00142         }

00149         public function getApplicationObject() {
00150                 return $this->app;
00151         }

00166                 $this->name = $name;

00255         public function hasLayout()
00256         {
00257                 $layout = "{$this->layoutDir}/{$this->layout}";
00258                 return is_file($layout) && is_readable($layout);
00259         }
00260         
00267         public function setContents($region, $content) {
00268                 $this->regions[$region] = $content;
00269         }
00270

00277                 return $this->regions[$region];
00278         }
00279         
00286         public function fetch() {
00287                 if ($this->template) $this->setContents(CONTENT_FOR_LAYOUT, parent::fetch($this->template));
00288                 return $this->render();
00289         }
00290         
00296         public function display() {
00297                 $this->sendHeaders();           
00298                 print $this->fetch();
00299         }
00300         
00305         public function runEvents() {
00306                 $events = explode(':', $this->app->GP($this->app->getGPEventsName()));
00307                 if (is_array($events)) {
00308                         foreach($events as $idx => $event) {
00309                                 $method = 'do' . ucfirst($event);
00310                                 if (method_exists($this, $method)) {
00311                                         call_user_func_array(array(&$this, $method), null);
00312                                 }
00313                         }
00314                 }               
00315         }
00316         
00322         protected function render() {
00323                 if ($this->hasLayout()) {
00324                         ob_start();
00325                         require("{$this->layoutDir}/{$this->layout}");
00326                         $contents = ob_get_contents();
00327                         ob_end_clean();
00328                 } else {
00329                         $contents = $this->regions[CONTENT_FOR_LAYOUT];
00330                 }
00331                 return $contents;
00332         }       
00333 }
